data.title: Jimmy Wales: ‘Twitter is making Elon Musk stupid’
data.meta_description: Jimmy Wales is used to defending Wikipedia against accusations of bias. The co-founder of this quasi-oracle is often caught between warring factions of debates
data.text:
Jimmy Wales is used to defending Wikipedia against accusations of bias. The co-founder of this quasi-oracle is often caught between warring factions of debates, most recently on coronavirus, the war in Ukraine and US politics. But when Elon Musk starts accusing your site of being a source of “left-wing bias”, the volume is cranked up.

Musk was irked recently by a proposal from one Wikipedia editor to delete an entry relating to the “Twitter Files”, Musk’s release of internal company documents to the media. The deletion never happened (it was rejected by other Wikipedia editors) but for Wales it exposed Musk’s stupidity and his lack of understanding of the site.

“I said to him ‘Reading too much of Twitter is making you stupid’. So that’s
